person.persName: John Griffin Carlisle (Covington atty & Legislator | Later Sec. Treasury, Speaker House, & Senator)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, native. Studied law under John W. Stevenson and William B. Kinkead. Married Mary Jane Goodson Carlisle on January 15, 1857. Practiced law in partnership with William B. Kinkead in 1857. Elected in 1859 and 1861 to the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky. Ran for the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in Kenton County in 1865, but was defeated by Mortimer M. Benton in an election whose result would eventually be overturned.
